verses.verse: <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood.<s%> Its <S%H753>length<s%> was two and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and its <S%H7341>breadth<s%> a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half,<s%> and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> its <S%H6967>height.<s%>

He <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H1004>inside<s%> and <S%H2351>outside,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2213>molding<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for it around <S%H5439>it.<s%>

He <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for <S%H702>it,<s%> in its four <S%H6471>feet;<s%> even <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on its <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6763>side,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> on its <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6763>side.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
He <S%H935>put<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> into the <S%H2885>rings<s%> on the <S%H6763>sides<s%> of the <S%H727>ark,<s%> to <S%H5375>bear<s%> the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> a mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%> Its <S%H753>length<s%> was two and a <S%H2677>half<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half<s%> its <S%H7341>breadth.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%> He <S%H6213>made<s%> them of beaten <S%H4749>work,<s%> at the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends<s%> of the mercy <S%H3727>seat;<s%>

<S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> at the one <S%H7098>end,<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> at the other <S%H7098>end.<s%> He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> of one piece with the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> at its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7098>ends.<s%>

The <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> spread <S%H6566>out<s%> their <S%H3671>wings<s%> on <S%H4605>high,<s%> <S%H5526>covering<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> with their <S%H3671>wings,<s%> with their <S%H6440>faces<s%> toward <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another.<s%> The <S%H6440>faces<s%> of the <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> were toward the mercy <S%H3727>seat.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H7979>table<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood.<s%> Its <S%H753>length<s%> was two <S%H520>cubits,<s%> and its <S%H7341>breadth<s%> was a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> and its <S%H6967>height<s%> was a <S%H520>cubit<s%> and a <S%H2677>half.<s%>
He <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2213>molding<s%> around <S%H5439>it.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H4526>border<s%> of a <S%H2948>handbreadth<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H6213>it,<s%> and made a <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2213>molding<s%> on its <S%H4526>border<s%> around <S%H5439>it.<s%>

He <S%H3332>cast<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> for <S%H5414>it,<s%> and put the <S%H2885>rings<s%> in the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H6285>corners<s%> that were on its <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
The <S%H2885>rings<s%> were close <S%H5980>by<s%> the <S%H4526>border,<s%> the <S%H1004>places<s%> for the <S%H905>poles<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H7979>table.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold,<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H7979>table.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H3627>vessels<s%> which were on the <S%H7979>table,<s%> its <S%H7086>dishes,<s%> its <S%H3709>spoons,<s%> its <S%H4518>bowls,<s%> and its <S%H7184>pitchers<s%> with <S%H2004>which<s%> to <S%H5258>pour<s%> <S%H2889>out,<s%> of pure <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%> He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> of beaten <S%H4749>work.<s%> Its <S%H3409>base,<s%> its <S%H7070>shaft,<s%> its <S%H1375>cups,<s%> its <S%H3730>buds,<s%> and its flowers were of one piece with <S%H6525>it.<s%>

There were <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> going <S%H3318>out<s%> of its <S%H6654>sides:<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> out of its <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6654>side,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> out of its <S%H8145>other<s%> <S%H6654>side:<s%>

<S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> made like almond <S%H8246>blossoms<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7070>branch,<s%> a <S%H3730>bud<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> made like almond <S%H8246>blossoms<s%> in the <S%H259>other<s%> <S%H7070>branch,<s%> a <S%H3730>bud<s%> and a <S%H6525>flower:<s%> so for the <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> going <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H4501>lampstand.<s%>
In the <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> were <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H1375>cups<s%> made like almond <S%H8246>blossoms,<s%> its <S%H3730>buds<s%> and its <S%H6525>flowers;<s%>

and a <S%H3730>bud<s%> under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of one piece with <S%H3730>it,<s%> and a bud under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of one piece with <S%H3730>it,<s%> and a bud under <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H7070>branches<s%> of one piece with <S%H8337>it,<s%> for the six <S%H7070>branches<s%> going out of <S%H3318>it.<s%>
Their <S%H3730>buds<s%> and their <S%H7070>branches<s%> were of one piece with <S%H259>it.<s%> The whole thing was one beaten <S%H4749>work<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> its <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H5216>lamps,<s%> and its <S%H4457>snuffers,<s%> and its snuff <S%H4289>dishes,<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> it of a <S%H3603>talent<s%> of <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> with all its <S%H3627>vessels.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood.<s%> It was <S%H7251>square:<s%> its <S%H753>length<s%> was a <S%H520>cubit,<s%> and its <S%H7341>breadth<s%> a <S%H520>cubit.<s%> Its <S%H6967>height<s%> was two <S%H520>cubits.<s%> Its horns were of one piece with <S%H7161>it.<s%>

He <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> it with <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H2091>gold,<s%> its <S%H1406>top,<s%> its <S%H7023>sides<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> <S%H7161>it,<s%> and its horns. He <S%H6213>made<s%> a <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H2213>molding<s%> around <S%H5439>it.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H2885>rings<s%> for it under its molding <S%H2213>crown,<s%> on its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6763>ribs,<s%> on its <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6654>sides,<s%> for <S%H1004>places<s%> for <S%H905>poles<s%> with which to carry <S%H5375>it.<s%>
He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H905>poles<s%> of <S%H7848>acacia<s%> <S%H6086>wood,<s%> and <S%H6823>overlaid<s%> them with <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> and the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H7004>incense<s%> of sweet <S%H5561>spices,<s%> after the <S%H4639>art<s%> of the <S%H7543>perfumer.<s%>
